summary: A doctor travels from America to India to investigate a man with paranormal healing powers, and uncovers the existence of a dark power that has the potential to transform humans into a new species.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Bipasha Basu|Sunil Shetty|Isha Koppikar|Kabir Bedi|Raj Zutshi|Amitabh Bachchan|Agnes Darenius|Negar Khan|Virendra Saxena|Farhad Shahnawaz
title: Rudraksh
